original_text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison, whom they had desired; but he delivered Jesus to their will.
korean_text: 그들이 요구하는 자 곧 민란과 살인으로 말미암아 옥에 갇힌 자를 놓아 주고 예수는 넘겨 주어 그들의 뜻대로 하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison
sentences.korean_translation: 반역과 살인으로 인해 감옥에 던져진 그 사람을
